amendment.description: To increase the funds provided to expand coverage for the uninsured from the $50 billion currently included in the budget resolution to the $88 billion recommended in the President's budget and offset the cost by reducing the unreconciled portion of the tax cut.

vote.text: Amendment SA 357 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 357 proposed by Senator Kennedy. (consideration: CR S4360-4361; text: CR S4360-4361) To increase the funds provided to expand coverage for the uninsured from the $50 billion currently included in the budget resolution to the $88 billion recommended in the President's budget and offset the cost by reducing the unreconciled portion of the tax cut.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 357 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 357 proposed by Senator Kennedy.
